review: It's a great idea, and when it works it's awesome, but it constantly drops the wireless signal, even though my router is right on the other side of the living room (and I have the upgraded comcast internet speed.) I'm going to buy the $99 plug-in model instead, to see if that doesn't get rid of the constant buffering and dropped signals.If not for the constant wireless issues, I'd give it 4 stars. Prime content needs to be a little better. It seems like 60% of their Prime content is infomerical and B-movie garbage. Not bad enough for 3 stars, but not good enough for 5, certainly.
author: David Monteith

review: 1 week ago we cancelled cable.  I had a Chromecast but we also have Amazon Prime so we figured we needed another device to stream from.  We purchased this product for our living room and LOVE it!!! It's Even easier than the Chromecast because u don't even need your phone to stream to the TV thanks to the simple remote it comes with!! We have Hulu Plus, Netflix and Prime and with this product it makes it so simple to navigate between apps and the picture quality is clear.  Really happy yet again with another Amazon product!!!  Set up was extremely easy!!! I was plugged in, up and running with all accounts linked in under 10 minutes!!!  Who needs cable when you have a FireStick?  Not us!!
